attributes.action: Review the way in which claims for compensation are dealt with
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It appears now that leaflet distributors can sue you for trapping their fingers in your letter box even though they have not been invited on to your property and clearly this persons post person has managed without a problem. Ambulance chasing is a scourge on our society and should be stopped. The only people who benefit are accident management companies, lawyers and solicitors. It is a disgraceful situation. Stop solicitors/Lawyers advertising. Stop people approaching you in the street asking if you have had an accident and stop Accident Management Companies from chasing you 3 years after an accident to see if they can make what amounts to false claims.
